description: This file contains database utility functions for a note management system, including configuration of the SQLite connection, database initialization, and query execution helpers.

methods.name: None _configure_connection(conn: sqlite3.Connection)
methods.description: Configures SQLite connection with pragmas and row factory.

methods.name: sqlite3.Connection open_connection(db_path: str)
methods.description: Opens and configures a SQLite database connection.

methods.name: None init_db(db_path: str)
methods.description: Initializes the database schema for notes if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: sqlite3.Cursor _execute_script(conn: sqlite3.Connection, sql: str, params: Optional[Iterable] = None)
methods.description: Executes an SQL script with optional parameters within a given connection.

ctags.name: _execute_script
ctags.pattern: /^def _execute_script(conn: sqlite3.Connection, sql: str, params: Optional[Iterable] = None) -> sq/
ctags.signature: (conn: sqlite3.Connection, sql: str, params: Optional[Iterable] = None)
